title: DualListSelector Props
description:
Acts as a container for all other DualListSelector sub-components when using a
composable dual list selector.

children.description: Content to be rendered in the dual list selector. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes applied to the dual list selector.

id.description: ID of the dual list selector.

isTree.description: Flag indicating if the dual list selector uses trees instead of simple lists.
